about_the_game:
True Love '95 MIDI Soundtrack is a collection of the original tracks from the game! Songs will be placed in yourTrue Love '95 folder in the Steam Directory: ...\Steam\SteamApps\common\True Love\Soundtrack

01: Title
02: For Daytime
03: For Love Scenes
04: For Shocked
05: Ending
06: Theme Of Anze
07: Theme Of Arisa Miyoshi
08: Theme Of Cheimi Fujimoto
09: Theme Of Mayumi Kamijo
10: Theme Of Mikae Morikawa
11: Theme Of Misako Sayama
12: Theme Of Miyuki Tanaka
13: Theme Of Remi Hemikawa
14: Theme Of Ryoko Shimazaki
15: Theme Of Yumi Matsumi

content_descriptors.notes: True Love '95 is an old school dating sim from the 90's. The game features consensual sex and partial nudity. The game takes place in a college setting. This DLC is only the MIDI soundtrack to the game and actually contains 0 adult content but as it is related to a product with adult content we are still filling this out.
